TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragDeltaEventHandler(object sender, DragDeltaEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragDeltaEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object where the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents a method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> routed event of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
